title: Shrewd Hatchling
text: Shrewd Hatchling enters the battlefield with four -1/-1 counters on it.: Target creature can't block Shrewd Hatchling this turn.Whenever you cast a blue spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Shrewd Hatchling.Whenever you cast a red spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Shrewd Hatchling.
